text: Hampton Lansden Fancher (born July 18, 1938) is an American actor who became a movie producer and screenwriter in the late 1970s.The New York Times He is known for writing the screenplay for Blade Runner. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Salon.com - The flamenco man: Hampton Fancher * * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles County, California Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles
title: Hampton Fancher
